Module FacebookStatus
In: facebook_bot/status.rb

Handles updating statuses on Facebook. Pretty straight forward.

Methods

set_status  

Public Instance methods

set_status(status)

Updates your status with the provided string. Will blow up if you give it an array, or anything insane like that. 

   fb.set_status 'getting caught in the rain'
